title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 April 2014 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit  
02:03 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
06:07 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
06:08 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
06:51 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
07:02 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:21 <mflorea> has quit  
07:26 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
07:28 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
07:30 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
07:30 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
08:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:52 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:53 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <Denis> has quit  
09:14 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
09:15 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:19 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <tmortagne1> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <tmortagne> has quit  
09:29 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <vmassol> good morning  
09:51 <cjd> gm  
09:51 <vmassol> tmortagne1: we still have a problem with DW/EM on myxwiki.org  
09:51 <vmassol> the DW keeps popping up  
09:53 <vmassol> any idea? could someone look into this (I've had some user contact me to tell me about the issue already)  
09:54 <tmortagne1> vmassol: it's fixed, xstream keep randomly saving crap but I can't find how to reproduce it  
09:54 <tmortagne1> it's fixed on main wiki at least  
09:55 <tmortagne1> note that even if the status is wrong it shows up only if the upgrade is not really done  
09:57 <tmortagne1> (in case of main wiki it shows up because it find an invalid extension on one of the wikis)  
09:57 <Denis> vmassol: what do you think of JetBrain reply ?, IntelliJ license expires tomorrow…  
10:00 <Denis> oups, not tomorrow  
10:00 <Denis> just right now for me :(  
10:01 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <Denis> has quit  
10:24 <vmassol> tmortagne1: I got the DW on the main wiki this morning  
10:24 <tmortagne1> vmassol: and now it's fixed  
10:24 <vmassol> ah ok :)  
10:25 <vmassol> so to fix it for some subwiki I need to edit the statyus.xml and change the status manually?  
10:26 <tmortagne1> no you click never and check if the saved status is right but usually it is  
10:26 <tmortagne1> I still don't know yet why in some cases xstream stop writing in the middle of the first element  
10:26 <vmassol> ok...  
10:29 <vmassol> today is final release date for 6.0 btw :)  
10:31 <vmassol> seems our install/update process is still too complex: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/DownloadFormFeedback  
10:31 <vmassol> I wonder what version of XWiki he's using  
10:32 <vmassol> he's not left his email so we cannot ask him...  
10:32 <vmassol> Q. Usability  
10:32 <vmassol> R. 1  
10:32 <vmassol> Q. Simplicity  
10:32 <vmassol> R. 1  
10:33 <vmassol> Q. Stability  
10:33 <vmassol> R. 4  
10:33 <vmassol> Q. Design  
10:33 <vmassol> R. 3  
10:33 <vmassol> Q. Speed  
10:33 <vmassol> R. 2  
10:34 <cjd> Stability -> 4   lets party  
10:47 <vmassol> tmortagne1: are you planning to release 6.0 final today?  
10:47 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <tmortagne1> vmassol: we need to fix at least XWIKI-10268 before  
10:48 <tmortagne1> we can't release a 6.0 that won't be usuable for myxwiki.org for example  
10:49 <vmassol> indeed, so on myxwiki.or it's not fixed yet right? SOLR is just diabled?  
10:49 <vmassol> \*disabled  
10:49 <tmortagne1> yes no SOLR on myxwiki.org  
10:49 <vmassol> ok  
10:49 <vmassol> yes I agree we need to fix this before the final release  
10:52 <vmassol> tmortagne1: do you know if this property is still used in 6.1M1: xwiki.action.export.xar.usewikistream=0 ?  
10:52 <vmassol> I'm trying to use the old export to export a page as XAR but it doesn't appear in the export menu  
10:52 <tmortagne1> it still has an effect if that's the question  
10:53 <vmassol> I'm in func tests  
10:53 <vmassol> (so I don't bundle wikistream)  
10:53 <tmortagne1> no sure what you mean this property doe snot have anything to do with the export menu  
10:54 <vmassol> the export menu entry used to be displayed before when the old xar code was used  
10:54 <vmassol> (since it was bundled in oldcore)  
10:54 <tmortagne1> XAR plugin never been removed from oldcore  
10:54 <vmassol> checking code  
10:55 <tmortagne1> maybe you don't have the xar plugin listed in your xwiki.cfg  
10:55 <vmassol> ah indeed it must have been removed I guess  
10:55 <vmassol> well no  
10:55 <tmortagne1> it hasn't been removed from XE no  
10:55 <tmortagne1> but if you use packager plugin you don't have XE default setup  
10:55 <vmassol> must be who was adding it before and forgot this time  
10:56 <vmassol> \*me  
10:56 <vmassol> thanks  
10:56 <vmassol> indeed found the code in vm: $!xwiki.getPlugin('package')"  
10:59 <tmortagne1> [WARN] restarting myxwiki.org  
11:33 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:49 <Denis> vmassol: thanks for the mail  
11:49 <vmassol> Denis: worst come worst, we can use the community edition  
11:50 <vmassol> for now you can use the 30 days eval ;)  
12:31 <evalica> has quit  
12:32 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:56 <D-Spair> has quit  
13:15 <evalica> has quit  
13:15 <vmassol> tmortagne1: https://spring.io/blog/2014/04/14/cache-abstraction-jcache-jsr-107-annotations-support  
13:16 <vmassol> (fyi)  
13:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:04 <evalica> has quit  
14:08 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:53 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
14:59 <D-Spair> has quit  
15:14 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:19 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:26 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:35 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
15:35 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:40 <Slashman\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <Slashman> has quit  
15:54 <msmeria> has quit  
16:02 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:18 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
16:56 <vmassol> tmortagne1: this seems very cool: https://github.com/jacoco/jacoco/pull/126  
16:56 <vmassol> AFAIU this will allow to use jacoco to compute overall platform coverage as we were doing with clover  
16:56 <tmortagne1> vmassol: yes, I saw it but did not looked at the detail  
16:56 <tmortagne1> looks like we won a new checkstyle rule, I'm looking at it  
16:57 <tmortagne1> checkstyle is validating that translations have same keys now  
16:57 <tmortagne1> looking at why it's enabled  
16:58 <tmortagne1> might sounds nice but we often have not complete translations  
16:59 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
16:59 <ClemensR> has quit  
16:59 <tmortagne1> vmassol: we do have <module name="Translation"/> rule in checkstyke.xml, looks like it never worked...  
17:00 <tmortagne1> vmassol: do you agree that we should not have it ?  
17:00 <vmassol> link?  
17:01 <vmassol> http://checkstyle.sourceforge.net/config\_misc.html#Translation  
17:01 <tmortagne1> yes  
17:01 <tmortagne1> looks like the upgrade "fixed" it and it's now taken into account  
17:01 <tmortagne1> but I don't think we can afford this rule  
17:02 <vmassol> agreed. It's nice but to run optionally but not all the time, maybe we should have it before releases?  
17:02 <tmortagne1> not even  
17:03 <tmortagne1> we will get failure for not complete translations  
17:03 <tmortagne1> and we have a lot of those  
17:03 <tmortagne1> removing it  
17:03 <tmortagne1> commenting actually  
17:03 <vmassol> with explanation yes :)  
17:03 <tmortagne1> yep
